Any math geniuses here know how to solve?
let total volume be x  volume removed be y
so after removed  left with (x-y)*0.9 milk  and (x-y)*0.1 water
then u add back y*0.3 milk and y*0.7 water
to get (x-y)*0.9+y*0.3 = 0.9x - 0.6y milk
final volume is still x  60% milk
0.9 * 0.5x = 0.45x milk removed
